name: The Arkham family
description:
The Arkham family

The arkham family are the guardians of the tree of remembrance. A mysterious tree that grants the family strange and unusual gifts. Through these gifts they built the city and was counted as the foremost of people of their society. But then a series of misadventures happened.
Jezebel went to the mysterious cave never to be heard from.
Simon the cousin went through a portal never to be heard of.
Crystal the aunt of the family disapeared among the jungles.
‘Leaving just You as David to try tn learn the truth of what happened. But every member is tied to the tree and it has one more secret that may change the familys fortunes yet again.
